Paragraph.Text: Improves Plasma-Imbued Missiles by using Pristine Stingers to sharpen the warhead and harden the missile. Increases damage 6 fold.
This machine requires hoppers holding at least 1 Plasma-Imbued Missile and Pristine Stinger to start the fitting process.

TwoColumnParagraph.Left: Manufacturing Time: Power Required: Power Capacity: Max. Power Recharge Rate:
